message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for sale. Considering its value and quality, we believe it's worth $145. We're confident you'll find it to be a great investment at this price.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm interested in the product, but I'm on a budget. Can you meet me at that price?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I must maintain the integrity of our pricing strategy. I am willing to negotiate further, so I am now offering the product for $135. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $135 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $132. Can we meet at this price?
